metadata.title: CVE-2024-21535 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package markdown-to-jsx before 7.4.0 are vulnerable toCross-site Scripting (XSS) via the src property due to improper inputsanitization. An attacker can execute arbitrary code by injecting amalicious iframe element in the markdown.

criterions.comment: node-markdown-to-jsx package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
